snippet: The first two games of the N.B.A. Finals have so far attracted more viewers than any finals since ESPN and ABC’s current deal with the league began in 2002-03, according to Nielsen.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder and Miami Heat have split the first two games of the NBA finals, exciting contests that have so far attracted more viewers than any finals since ESPN and ABC’s current deal with the league began in 2002-03; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The first two games of the N.B.A. Finals have so far attracted more viewers than any finals since ESPN and ABC’s current deal with the league began in 2002-03, according to Nielsen.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Finals — T.V. Ratings Up Seven Percent From Last Year
headline.main: T.V. Ratings for Finals Up Seven Percent From Last Year
